resources.string: Here we will have the PlayList Queue. Grayed item is the playing track. I should\'ve added a minimize button to hide the list. For now click on Now playing bar to HIDE. Clicking on any item will send us to the player to play this song.
This activity is where you will browse the library and go to other libraries
Here we list the tracks of this genre and a click on it will take us to the player to play it
Here is our player, I implemented MediaPlayer for test with seeker functioning perfectly!
